problem.markdown:
Which of the following are form pointers for Shuttle Sprints?
[x] Starting position is a staggered stance with the right foot forward. The right heel is even with the toes of the left foot. [ ] Soldiers should not slow their movement before planting feet and changing direction. [x] Soldiers should squat while bending the trunk when reaching to touch the ground as they change direction. [ ] Soldiers touch the ground with their left hand on the first turn, then with their right hand on the second turn. [ ] Accelerate to near maximum speed during the last 25-yard interval.
[explanation] Starting position is a staggered stance with the right foot forward. The right heel is even with the toes of the left foot. Soldiers should slow their movement before planting feet and changing direction. Soldiers should squat while bending the trunk when reaching to touch the ground as they change direction. Soldiers touch the ground with their left hand on the first turn, then with their right hand on the second turn. Accelerate to near maximum speed during the last 25-yard interval. [explanation]
